title: $285 Weekly Dormer One ~ Fully Furn Apartment
posting_body: ['Modern amenities and much convenience in a house where the splendor of the Victorian era has been lovingly preserved.', "You'll enter this unique space through the main entrance, pass through a hallway and enter your private room.", 'Inside, the brand new queen size bed features a cozy quilt plus 500 thread count sheets.', 'Linen curtains accent the bed and a pair of decorative side lamps add balance and easy lighting.', 'This room also features vanity with sink, a built-in book case and a walk-in closet.', 'Room offers access to a shared bathroom and kitchen with an automatic Keurig coffee and tea maker with pods that will start your mornings with ease.', 'The fully equipped kitchen includes a gas stove, microwave oven and fridge.', 'Meal prep is simple with a full set of cookware, knives and spices.', 'Enjoy your meal on china dishes at the high top table.', 'A newly remodeled bathroom features all new black tile and twin sinks.', 'You’ll find the shower well stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, a fresh bar of soap and fluffy white towels in your room.', 'The closet is equipped with an iron and ironing board and a hair dryer conveniently located in the desk.', 'Guests also have access to the washer and dryer and and free on-street parking.', 'My 1895 era house is located in Uptown, one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Minneapolis.', 'You’ll find yourself a short walk from the Walker Art Museum and its famous “Spoon Bridge” sculpture, Lake of the Isles, Spyhouse Coffee, The Wedge Coop Grocery Store, and The Basilica of St. Mary.', 'Contact Daniel at', 'show contact info', '$1100 - Monthly rate', '$285 plus $45 cleaning - Weekly rate', '$45 plus $45 cleaning - Daily rate', 'Guest access', 'You are renting one of six units in my home and I will provide you with a key upon arrival.', 'Interaction with guests', 'I am as available as you need me to be.', "Don't hesitate to call or text with questions, even if you just need a restaurant suggestion.", "I'm here!", 'About Me', 'My name is Daniel.', 'I purchased this house in 2001 and have been lovingly renovating it ever since.', 'I have honored the spirit of the original building while thoughtfully adding my own touches and inspiration.', 'One of my great passions in life is Argentine Tango, so I named each apartment after a beloved Argentine musician.', 'If you are curious about the dance scene in the Twin Cities, I’m happy to point you towards the best milongas and I also offer lessons.', 'Other things to note', "If I were visiting Minneapolis and could only do one thing, I'd rent a Nice Ride and bike around the sparkling chain of Lakes.", 'Lake Harriet, Lake of the Isles, and Lake Bde Maka Ska are all nearby.', 'Stroll over to the Walker Art Center and take a selfie in the outdoor sculpture garden with the iconic "Spoon Bridge" or cherry on a spoon.', 'Or head over to Eat Street on Nicollet Avenue for a whole world of dining options and pay a visit to the Minneapolis Art Institute.', 'Pop on over to Spyhouse for a caffeine fix or stop at Nightingale for oysters and other fancy bar snacks.', 'More popular sites in the Twin Cities are The Guthrie Theater, Stone Arch Bridge, Surly Brewing Co for craft beers and delicious food, or a visit to the iconic Mall of America.', 'We’ve got plenty to offer sports fans too with the Minnesota Twins at Target Field, the Timberwolves at Target Center and the Vikings at U.S Bank Stadium.']
